summary: The movie deals with the difference of opinion between the westernized, educated, modern Muslims and their counterparts who follow their religion and live life in the name of 'God'.
cast: Shaan Shahid|Fawad Khan|Iman Ali|Austin Marie Sayre|Larry Newman|Rasheed Naz|Naeem Tahir|Seemi Raheel|Humayun Kazmi|Angela Williams|Alex Edwards|Hameed Sheikh|Rufus Graham|Najeeb Ullah Anjum|Ayub Khoso|Naseeruddin Shah|Najeeba Faiz|Shabnam Faiz|Rahul Gill|Naz Khan|Jonathan C. Legat|Steven Moore|Elaine Rivkin|Matt Weber|Jeremy Kruse|Jocelyn Wesler
title: Khuda Kay Liye
